mapper.sql: SELECT no, title, content, admin_date adminDate, admin_id adminId
mapper.insert:
SELECT administrator_notice_no_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO administrator_notice VALUES (#{no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{adminDate}, #{adminId})
mapper.select: SELECT an.no, an.title, an.content, an.admin_date, an.admin_id, a.admin_id, a.admin_name, a.admin_phone, a.admin_email FROM administrator_notice an, administrator a WHERE an.admin_id(+)=a.admin_id AND an.no=#{value}

SELECT an.no, an.title, an.content, an.admin_date, an.admin_id, a.admin_id, a.admin_name, a.admin_phone, a.admin_email FROM administrator_notice an, administrator a WHERE an.admin_id=a.admin_id(+) ORDER BY an.no

SELECT an.no, an.title, an.content, an.admin_date, an.admin_id, a.admin_id, a.admin_name, a.admin_phone, a.admin_email FROM administrator_notice an, administrator a WHERE an.title LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%' ORDER BY an.no

SELECT an.no, an.title, an.content, an.admin_date, an.admin_id, a.admin_id, a.admin_name, a.admin_phone, a.admin_email FROM administrator_notice an, administrator a WHERE an.content LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%' ORDER BY an.no
